about.title: Hi, I'm Tony
about.desc: A Frontend / UI Specialist with creative design skills, from God's own country. I started my career as a Flash developer and transitioned into UI development. If your vision matches with my passion, let's connect!

projects.title: Altares
projects.desc: We reengineered a web portal for Altares, a single data source for Belgium, Netherlands and Luxembourg markets to provide data/products loaded from different sources like bulk uploads and manual data entry application. Users can view / modify financial and legal data related to individuals and businesses. Worked on Frontend functionalities using Angular, HTML5, CSS3, TypeScript and BootStrap.

projects.title: Verizon
projects.desc: Verizon wireless project involved migration of AEM content to responsive HTML design. Worked on HTML, CSS, and jQuery. Work involved making the page responsive, creating interactive components and fixing UI defects.

projects.title: AutoZone
projects.desc: AutoZone is a portal which had to be refactored to responsive web design for support in Desktop, Mobile and tablet. The portal involves sale of automobile parts. Technologies involved are React, Redux, HTML5, CSS3 and Material UI. Worked on defect fixes, accessibility, flow errors and test cases.

projects.title: Dashboard app
projects.desc: This is a responsive dashboard app created using Ant design. Powered using React, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, SASS and Ant design.

contact.title: Contact
contact.desc: Click on the links below and feel free to reach out to me
